submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        
        l1 = SortedList()
        l2 = SortedList()
        
        for x, y in points:
            l1.add(x + y)
            l2.add(x - y)
        res = float('inf')
        for x, y in points:
            l1.remove(x + y)
            l2.remove(x - y)
            res = min(res, max(l1[-1] - l1[0], l2[-1] - l2[0]))
            l1.add(x + y)
            l2.add(x-y)
        return res
